channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Where the FAA is cutting flights because of the shutdown
item.description: Map: Axios Visuals At least 800 flights were canceled Friday at 40 airports across the U.S. as the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) slashed route...

item.title: Iran plotted to assassinate Israel's ambassador to Mexico, U.S. officials say
item.description: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) planned to assassinate Israel's ambassador to Mexico, Einat Kranz-Neiger, but the plot was foiled last...

item.title: Dems' resistance stymies DOJ in Stephen Miller doxxing case
item.description: The Justice Department's push to investigate a progressive activist accused of doxxing top Trump adviser Stephen Miller has been stymied by two judges...

item.title: Watch the extended interview with Palantir CEO Alex Karp on "The Axios Show"
item.description: Palantir co-founder and CEO Alex Karp joins Mike Allen on the Season 1 finale of "The Axios Show." Go deeper: Watch the episode Subscribe to our YouTu...

item.title: Elise Stefanik announces run for New York governor with focus on affordability
item.description: Elected to the House as a moderate, Elise Stefanik evolved into a fierce Trump defender, and her announcement could set up a faceoff with New York Gov...

item.title: In MAGA stronghold, fury over SNAP but little blame for Trump in shutdown
item.description: People who use SNAP in Mike Johnson’s congressional district wonder why his power hasn’t protected them, but many lay the blame on Washington’s dysfun...

item.title: How a backlash to Trump fueled Democratic gains with Latino voters
item.description: The president’s deportation policies, along with high prices and changes in who turned out to vote propelled a shift in this year’s election.

item.title: Travelers brace for turmoil as flight cuts kick in at major U.S. airports
item.description: Airlines have canceled more than 1,000 flights to comply with a shutdown-related FAA directive to reduce traffic at 40 airports, including Atlanta, Ch...

item.title: Alex Karp unplugged: Palantir CEO on "The Axios Show"
item.description: Alex Karp , co-founder and CEO of Palantir , tells me on a new episode of "The Axios Show" that AI could lead to dysfunction and even violence if bene...

item.title: Trump wants to abolish the filibuster. GOP senators aren’t on board.
item.description: The president wants to end the filibuster to reopen the government and to do “so many things.”

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
